item.title: Toon Account
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:7, topic:516163”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=634422.msg4285813#msg4285813 date=1366317670]

Wow, this piece of artwork is simply a masterpiece. I would categorize it with some of the greats such as Picasso. The brilliant use of the color black is stunning. Spelling Swag Fag with E’s was a marvelous effect. I’d say this masterpiece would be priced in the millions. You sir, are going places. Must I mention that realistic hand? Splendid.

1: everything you ever posted in this section sucked, second this is a toon account, you spell shit funny and purposely draw like shit. Now, I want to go finger pop your asshole like you always do, and agressively love yourself. Goodbye.
[/quote]

What dufuq? I was just kidding bro? I know it’s not supposed be a masterpiece? Learn Sarcasm.[/quote]
Maybe you should too.

Read full topic

Wow, this piece of artwork is simply a masterpiece. I would categorize it with some of the greats such as Picasso. The brilliant use of the color black is stunning. Spelling Swag Fag with E’s was a marvelous effect. I’d say this masterpiece would be priced in the millions. You sir, are going places. Must I mention that realistic hand? Splendid.
[/quote]
1: everything you ever posted in this section sucked, second this is a toon account, you spell shit funny and purposely draw like shit. Now, I want to go finger pop your asshole like you always do, and agressively love yourself. Goodbye.[/quote]
Interesting, you want to go and finger pop his area like he does but will it have the same effect if you do it?

Did you use paint for this? Despite this being a “toon account” you should still work on making it appear as if the character can do normal things like holding the lightsaber. Unless of course you want him to look like he has mad skills and can hold it without his fingers, that would be amazing.
